page.title: 07Village Activities
page.content:
Village hall. After the judging and prizegiving, many of the exhibits are auctioned to raise money for the upkeep of the Hall.
The Children's Adventure Club has a tradition of organising activities for the whole village. Each year they hire a coach and run a Summer outing to the seaside for anyone who wishes to go along. At Christmas 1984 they held a Christmas party and in 1985 the village children plan to entertain the adults with a pantomime. The club also arranges various fund-raising events which are always well attended. A particularly successful and much appreciated idea this year was to serve cream teas in the garden of one of the local houses. Others have included coffee mornings, P T O . . . . . .
